title: PBE ACCOUNT NOT WORKING
body:
I have made a PBE account on 10/14 or 10/15 2017. I tried logging in on the client when it was done downloading and it said that my username or password was incorrect. 
And i tried making a ticket waiting a few days got a short answer but didnt help replied as fast as i could and im waiting another day for an answer...

replies.body:
i have a PBE account but i have no RP and no BE .. weird :(
pls fix it {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
Our account team is a little back up right now with the PBE coming back up.  If you already have a ticket open, hang tight and a specialist will reach out as soon as they can!
Same problem i sent a ticket and i didnt got a reply yet.
